Modules

Course Career Support

Career Support

Your path from beginner to employed web developer starts here. Whether youâ€™re looking to jump into a career in tech, or level-up at your current job, our career services team will work with you from day one!

Personalized Approach

Tell us your ultimate goal, and we will work together to create a plan of action.

Learn and Build

Learn job relevant skills, build a portfolio of projects, get resume help, and practice mock interviews.

Network Placement

Get personalized introductions to hiring companies and attend networking events.

Want to know more about your future career options? Give us a call!

1-888-511-9155

Course Schedule

Typical Day

By focusing as much as possible on project based learning, lecture time is kept to a minimum. You can expect the average day to unfold as follows:

10am â€” Class

Teacher guided lectures, live coding, and demos. Take a seat and yu absorb some knowledge!

					<label for="last-name" class="visually-hidden">Last Name</label>
					<input type="text" name="last-name" id="last-name" placeholder="Last Name" />
	
					<label for="tel" class="visually-hidden">Your Phone (optional)</label>
					<input type="tel" name="tel" id="tel" placeholder="Your Phone (optional)" />
	
					<label for="email" class="visually-hidden">Email</label>
					<input type="email" name="email" placeholder="Your email">
	
					<label for="message" class="visually-hidden">Your message</label>
					<textarea name="message" id="message" placeholder="Your message"></textarea>
	
					<div class="optin-checkbox">
						<input type="checkbox" name="list-optin" id="list-optin" value="yes" />
						<label for="list-optin">Send me info about courses, workshops and events in our growing Montreal tech community.</label>
					</div>
	
					<input class="btn-large" type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit">
	
					<div class="foot-note text-body-small text-subtle">
						By providing us with your email, you agree to the terms of our <a href=#>Privacy Policy</a> and <a href="#">Terms of Service</a>.
					</div>
				</form>
				<!-- /.contact-form -->
			</div>
			<!-- /.module-boxed -->
		</div>
		<!-- /.wrapper -->
	</section>
	<!-- /.module -->

Form Optin

Get Instant access to our prep course material

Discover the content our applicants must complete for admission, or start learning on your own!

By providing us with your email, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
